sentences.english: Can you finish on your own?
Obviously the quizzes must be worked on your own.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這些隨堂考必須由你獨力完成。

sentences.english: Francis translated that French novel by himself.
sentences.chinese: 法蘭西斯獨力翻譯那本文法文小說。

sentences.english: She had climbed out by herself and walked home.
sentences.chinese: 她獨力爬出籃子，往家走去。

sentences.english: Mr. Smart raised his six children on a rural farm in eastern Washington State.
sentences.chinese: 史墨先生在東華盛頓州的農莊中獨力撫養大六個孩子。

sentences.english: He created an all-English learning environment that allowed his English to improve quickly.
sentences.chinese: 獨力打造出全英語的學習環境讓他的英文進步飛快。
